2081.subject: HCOM
2081.descrlong: Students analyze the works of one or two authors and study the historical, social, and political contexts of their work in-depth. Varying content each semester. Please contact professor about which authors will be studied. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 6 or the concentration in Literary and Film Studies. Requires successful completion of the ENGCOM ULR. (Offered every other year.)
